cause.description:
This group is dedicated to promoting israel, supporting the IDF and all they do, speaking out against injustice done to israel, and spreading the word about how vital israel is to our modern world.
1. "We can forgive the arabs for killing our children. We cannot forgive them for forcing us to kill their children. We will only have peace with the arabs when they learn to love their children more than they hate us" -Golda Meir
2. Support the IDF
3. Shalom
4. Where ever we stand, we stand with Israel
cause.mission: Promote Pro-Israel messages, support peace, stand with israel 24/7
cause.name: J.F.I.S.E.(Jews For Israel's Safe Existance)
